body:
I could easily follow the method I used for the rview -> rvu change,  
which is to install a symbolic link for compatibility in the install  
directory (genbox -> genrbox).  Bernd would put this link in the  
special directory, and genbox would become genrbox.  The manual page  
wouldn't necessarily be linked, since genrbox would be the new,  
official name.  Old scene files would still work on all installations  
done with makeall, and the Debian package would only require setting  
the PATH variable to make sure it works.  Following this solution  
seems quite reasonable to me, and I'm grateful that it's only one  
generator/program that's been hit by this (so far).  It would be much  
worse if xform had to be renamed, and that's a pretty generic name --  
we got off lucky.


-Greg
